title: Mated To The Vikens
description: For Sophia Antonelli, anything is better than spending twenty-five years in jail, even being mated to not one, but three Viken warriors.Her Viken mates believe claiming an Interstellar Bride will be easy, especially if she's matched to all three of them. But they don't expect her to be kidnapped during transport. When Sophia is caught in the crossfire of an evil organization determined to assassinate the Viken queen, it will take all three of them to save her.
author: Grace  Goodwin
